attributes.action: Commit to giving a plan for 2022 GCSEs and A levels by this summer
attributes.additional_details: to give certainty to exam boards, teachers and students.
attributes.background: I would like this government to commit to announcing what they plan to do with GCSEs and A levels by this summer giving plenty of time for students like myself, exam boards and teachers time to prepare

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
